title_short: (28410) Manzanares el Real - 2 Diseminado los Algibes

title: () -
description: Very quiet picnic area, with lots of tables and stone snacks. It is also a cattle route. Overnight with a car one night and great

title: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 2 Avenida de la Paz
description: Parking in raised ground on a municipal ground. It is a quiet place to spend the night, even if it is in the village. It is very close to El Boalo access to La Pedriza. In a large park where there are sports fields, a fountain, etc. Area with very nice views and lots of shade. Wooded and sheltered. At City Hall, they told us it was ok if they are not long stays. The first week of July, apparently, there is a feria. Maybe there are more difficulties. We had two nights without problems, there was only one other van. Great for walking in the Sierra.

title: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
title_short: (28413) El Boalo - 18 Calle de la Peña Hoyuela
description: Parking in the center of the village 3 minutes from the plaza del ayuntamiento, very quiet for the night.

title: (28791) Soto del Real - Unnamed Road
description: Pleasant recreational area with tables and bins. Walking and bicycle area. Near is the road.

title: (28413) El Boalo - 6 M-617
description: Great place to come and relax after visiting Madrid. All services clean and free, large parking area for motorhomes with views to the Sierras. Town has bakery, small supermarket and a couple of bars. New bollards with electrical supply but not commission yet.

title: (28791) Madrid - 1 Diseminado Cr Manzanares
description: Parking to rest and then follow the route! Clean point.

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
description: Small car park near the medieval bridge. Nice place for a picnic. By a main road but not too busy at night. No facilities other than picnic benches.

title: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo
title_short: (28412) El Boalo - 579 Carretera de Colmenar Viejo

title: (28791) Soto del Real - 18 Avenida de los Jazmines
title_short: (28791) Soto del Real - 18 Avenida de los Jazmines

title: (28791) Soto del Real - 1 Calle San Jorge
title_short: (28791) Soto del Real - 1 Calle San Jorge
description: Terrain parking in the middle of Soto del Real. Quiet place.

title: (28492) Mataelpino - 30 Calle Manuel de Falla
description: Large flat and quiet land parking with beautiful views.

title: (28492) Mataelpino - 14 Calle del Pocillo
description: Dirt parking on the outskirts of town, next to the Camino de Santiago. Dirt parking in the upper part of the town, at the exit towards La Maliciosa and La Barranca. The Camino de Santiago and a cattle route pass by, a little further on there is a cattle resting place with a large trough where dogs can cool off very comfortably. Very quiet and discreet place to spend the night although it is within the town. Nearby there are shops and the town square, where there is a fountain and bathrooms. There is also a hostel for pilgrims. From that point there are two super nice roads, one to the west along the livestock route and the other to the east through the Sierra de los Porrones, with spectacular views). At the foot of Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many routes, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago... La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada are also nearby.

title: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
title_short: (28492) El Boalo - 72P Avenida de los Linares
description: Wooded parking in the center of the village. It is a quiet place to stay overnight, even if it is in the city. There is a large parking lot, in the upper part it is more hidden from view and there is a lot of shade. It is in the center but it is discreet and very calm. Opposite there are shops and next to it is the town square, where there is a fountain and wc. At the foot of the Maliciosa, in the Sierra de Guadarrama National Park. There are many trails, PR, GR, Camino de Santiago ... it is also near La Pedriza, La Barranca and Puerto de Navacerrada.

title: (28770) Colmenar Viejo - Km. 4.5 Carretera Guadalix
description: Recreational area the hermitage of Remedies. Quiet location next to a little-traveled road. Ideal to spend a night in the area without problems.

title: (28492) El Boalo - 22 M-617
description: Parking next to Mataelpino from where a route leaves to crown Maliciosa. A little uneven, without services. The bad thing is that at night on weekends the "fornicas" of the area go with the thud and when they leave the picoletos appear and they wake you up with bangs and then apologize because totally, the parking is not not prohibited. Better during the week.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - Calle Carretera la Barranca 6

RECOMMENDED: Quiet and secure parking in Navacerrada

title_short: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 11 Camino del Cementerio
description: Parking for vans in a quiet place a bit out of town. Access open 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Access gate to the park "la cabilda". Drinking water source ten minutes walk inside the park. There are several sources inside; They are not signposted, but the path is wide enough to find them easily. Quiet and discreet place, little frequented except for summer weekends during the day.

title: (28741) Rascafría - Calle Angostura
description: Parking Valdesky ski station. Without services Parking with enough inclination. They allow you to park without any problem in the parking lot on the left next to the fence.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 3 Pasaje de las Eras
description: Small parking on the other side of the park. a little more flat and quiet for my taste, there is less passage of people and on Sundays there are fewer people, because in the parking lot below many people leave the car to take the vermouth from the El Porron bar and sometimes they block the access road , do not miss visiting it, playground next door. It is a parkimg not a campsite. prohibited to take out goods abroad. Vehicles over 7m50 pass carefully

title: (28491) Navacerrada - 9A Calle Presbítero Blanco
description:
Free public parking just behind the local police office. To enter this place you must have access between the police building and El Porrón Restaurant.
At the corner of the entrance you can see a yellow sign indicating the direction to this public parking.
It is a place protected from the wind and very quiet since it is located between urbanized areas and although it is very close to the center, no noise or traffic is heard.
It has a large park but the nearest fountain is in Plaza del Gargantón a few meters away and from which you can catch water but not load tanks with hose.
At the moment it is of beaten earth and it is a very calm place.
Prohibited to remove tables, chairs or any other camping element. Please respect the environment and use the bins.

title: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 34A Avenida de Juan Carlos I
title_short: (28240) Hoyo de Manzanares - 34A Avenida de Juan Carlos I
description: Se entra por una calle al parecer privada, pero no lo es. te deja justo en el campo. Es llano, pero no hay servicios. pasea mucha gente al perro por las mañanas, pero muy calmado. a dos minutos del centro del pueblo.

title: (28491) Navacerrada - Magdalena 15-17
description: Quiet place to park and spend the night. It lacks services but it is very close to the urban center and one step away from the Navacerrada reservoir.

title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - CL-601

title: (28248) La Berzosa - 8 Avenida la Berzosa

The car park is not for motorhomes, but then there is space for some motorhomes and if you go a little further (towards the city), on the right, there is a esplanade of land where it is even easier for motorhomes. The site is perfect for trekking and mountain biking, it is very beautiful. The city has a lot of life

title: (28741) Rascafría - Unnamed Road
description: Mirador de los Robledos, ground parking, narrow access, spectacular views, generally leveled. only trash containers.

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 211 Diseminado Embalse Navalmedio
description: Parking on the ground. Quiet, access by small road in good condition. Hiking, mountain biking and climbing. Do not forget that it is a car park, not a campsite, we are discreet, to empty and fill one goes to the El Boalo area. Be careful in winter, the road can be cut by the snow.

name: Dehesa Park
title: (28400) Dehesa Park
description: Dehesa Park car park. Area with trees. Picnic area, fountains, circuit of about 4 km surrounded by cows, bulls, horses... Chiringuito nearby. About 10 minutes walk from the village of Villalba with all services (pharmacy-opencor-bakery-shops, municipal swimming pool and restaurants).

title: (28794) Guadalix de la Sierra - 8 Calle Prado Panetes
title_short: (28794) Guadalix de la Sierra - 8 Calle Prado Panetes
description:
Parking in the esplanades of an institute. There are areas where there are no tire tracks, so they are areas without regular use. There is no shade and it is on the outskirts of the town but in a 5 minute walk there are areas with shops and bars.
Although it seems quite lonely, the area is very quiet.
The sun rises behind the institute and there is morning shadow.

title: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces
title_short: (28450) Collado Mediano - 3 Calle de los Sauces

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 24 Calle de la Pasada

name: Camping El Valle
title: (28720) Camping El Valle
description: Camping El Valle. Quiet, family friendly, with lots of flowers and trees for shady pitches. It looks old but be careful. Especially with fixed people with Mobil home but also plots with / without electricity and bungalows. It has a summer pool. Views of the mountains, beautiful area

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 53 Calle Manuel González Amezúa
description: Great quiet and quiet place, attached to a small river, (You can only hear the relaxing noise of the water). To park and spend the night, ideal if you travel with young children like me. There is a small playground, a picnic area and a hiking trail.

title: (28430) Alpedrete - 32B Calle de Santa Quiteria
description: Parking place where many cars enter and there is a lot of space. Right in front there is a huge park with skate park soccer fields and a fountain

title: (28470) Cercedilla - 22 Calle de Navalcaballo

title_short: (28794) Guadalix de la Sierra - 30 Carretera Vieja del Pantano
description: An ornamental fountain attached to the road, a road with little traffic, it can be easily stopped and filled.

title: (28439) Alpedrete - 22 Calle de la Parra

title: (28741) Rascafría - Calle de Abelardo Gallego
description: Parking of the natural pools of "Las Presillas" has many parking spaces, without size limitations (there are spaces for buses) large green area with a beach bar in summer (which has a bathroom ONLY for customers). The car park opens from 9 a.m. to 9 p.m. and is closed at night, so if you don't take your vehicle out, it will be held (it can't be taken out). In the gatehouse at the entrance we have asked and you can spend the night, in the morning they come to collect the new day. Chairs, tables, awnings, tents, ball games... but everyone puts them up is prohibited on the meadows. Dogs allowed as long as they are on a leash.

title: (28400) Collado Villalba - 33 Calle Cañada Real
description: Place to park in Villalba, near the old town and near shopping centers

title: (28743) Canencia - Calle Cantarranas
description: Parking in the recreation area, with water, basutras and banks ... Many walking routes. Better than at the end of the road.

title: (28740) Rascafría - Calle de Abelardo Gallego
description: Parking of the monastery. The morning bells ring at 7:45. You can spend the day at the waterfalls for 5 euros.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 13 Calle 6 Sau

title: (28720) Bustarviejo - 1T Calle Cuesta del Cantón

title: (28479) Cercedilla - 5 Diseminado las Dehesas

title: (28794) -
description: Beautiful place to spend the night without being disturbed by almost anything because you cannot bathe but if it is for fishing, hiking and MTB ... there are no shadows (a shame) ... we have been one night and great ... .But in the afternoon the guard passed by and did not tell us anything .... if you run out of water you have outside the yacht club (left side) a fountain along the walkway that is on the hiking route (bring a lot of water and cream that in summer you roast or heat handles ... be careful when entering the road has many potholes, go slowly ...... enjoy it but respect it and take care of it .. Thank you

title: (28740) Rascafría - 17D Calle de la Torre
description: Ample parking area, within the urban area, grass floors, well leveled.

title: (28260) Galapagar - 14 Calle del Zafiro
description: Motorhome parking in a quiet urbanization. The urbanization has a guard booth with a barrier but they always open as it is an urbanization built on public land.

title: (28720) Bustarviejo - 3 Calle de la Prensa
description: Quiet parking, without services and flat. We were alone and spent the night without any noise.

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - 7 Ronda de Valdecarrizo
description: Free parking for trucks and all kinds of camper cars and others, during the day many cars pass because there are factories around but at night no one passes on the road and it is very quiet, next to it there is a promenade with trees to walk, go for a walk with the dog It is to stop one day when you are very tired. there are garbage cans on the street.

title: (28760) Tres Cantos - 2 Avenida de Mariano Aragón García
title_short: (28760) Tres Cantos - 2 Avenida de Mariano Aragón García
description: Terre parking near a pine forest and the Pinosierra American private school. Only some parents use it momentarily to go to drop off and pick up the children from the boarding school. You will recognize it from the highway by a giant flag of the United States that is in the entrance. Very quiet residential area with quick access to the 607 motorway

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Río Guadiana
description: Large esplanade with part in shadow next to several gas stations with shop and a Supercor. Very quiet, even at the Guadarrama parties.

title: (40109) La Granja de San Ildefonso - 130-134 CL-601
title_short: (40109) La Granja de San Ildefonso - 130-134 CL-601
description: Calm parking. Forbidden to sleep Nice area for hiking and biking.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 12 Calle de la Sierra
description: Parking for cars and RVs. You can spend the night here during the week and outside of events. Then many cars park here and it will be difficult to get out again. We visited the medieval market. Very quiet during the week. Without services.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5 Calle de los Escoriales
description: Parking behind the supermarket with many places for any size. Did not slept here, but used to visit the city

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 5B Calle de los Escoriales
description: For troubleshooting, NON-DRINKING water at the service station.

title: (40109) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 129-133 CL-601
title_short: (40109) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 129-133 CL-601
description: The seats. Very cool and quiet picnic area. Close to the town of Valsaín and the farm. Ideal to enjoy in the middle of nature. It is a forest with a river and trails. Please take care of the place. Don't make a fire. Do not get it dirty. Respect the animals that roam there.

title: (28260) Galapagar - 2 Calle Ana María Matute
description: Quiet parking to sleep near the gas station and the sports center near the center of town.

title: (28723) Pedrezuela - 1 Diseminado Casilla Pajares
description: A quiet place surrounded by the countryside and with a cave at the bottom of the parking lot with water at first then it is dry, there are bats of different types that are curious.

title: (28750) San Agustín del Guadalix -
description: Great place, nice view, very peaceful. In the morning for walkers and mountain bikers. Difficult access by small paths (it goes by L2H2 van) Pretty waterfall (cascada del hervidero) above the village of San Augustin del Guadalix.

title: (28290) Las Rozas de Madrid - 4 Calle Chile
title_short: (28290) Las Rozas de Madrid - 4 Calle Chile
description: Parking lots in a very quiet street near gás station

title: (28743) Canencia - 147 Calle Diseminado
description: Great esplanade to spend the night, quiet place surrounded by nature. Easy access by a road in good condition for any vehicle, there is no height limit. We spent the night there, advised by the Forest Agents after we got kicked out of the Pto Canencia recreational area due to "the covid" ... they told us that there we would have no problems staying overnight and that's how it was.

title: (28723) Pedrezuela - 1 Diseminado Arroyo Prados
description: Good place to spend the day and night. A few meters ahead there is a no-trespassing sign. We enter through C. Àvila. The entire reservoir is surrounded by a fence, since bathing is prohibited. It is a fishing ground and many fishermen jump that fence to spend the day with the rod on the shore. In the morning many cyclists and people walking. There are containers, please make use of them, we saw a lot of garbage on the walk we did .. a shame. From the E-5, send a chunk along a road with many potholes, take the detour and pass by the restaurant "Los nueva hornos de Ángel".

title: (28440) Guadarrama - 21 Calle Fuente del Espino
description: Quiet street for parking with chalets on both sides. We have spent the night very very well. Recommended for a rest stop.

name: Camping D'oremor
title: (28721) Camping D'oremor
description: Family camping with all the necessary services, perfect for a stopover in the northern mountains.

title: (40109) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 9 Calle Segunda
title_short: (40109) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 9 Calle Segunda
description: Sawmill parking area. Weekends without movement in it. Secluded area from the town houses and quiet. Departures to the Valsain forest. Some leveled sites. No services of any kind

title: (28723) Pedrezuela - 1 Diseminado Cl Eras
description: A very complete playground (several areas, zip line, sports court, trampolines ...) and picnic tables, some with shadows. There are large parking places next door and if not a 3 min walk the municipal parking lot.

title: (28723) Pedrezuela - 42 Calle Cerro de San Pedro
title_short: (28723) Pedrezuela - 42 Calle Cerro de San Pedro

title_short: (28729) Venturada - 1C Camino del Canal de Isabel II

title: (28729) Venturada - Carr. de Madrid Burgos

description: Troubleshooting for one night in the center of the village

title: (28729) Venturada - 560 Calle de los Álamos
description: Close to the highway for an overnight stopover. Admittedly noisy but large flat and clear location near a forest. Accessible to any vehicle, no service.

title: (28721) Cabanillas de la Sierra - 3 Calle Perdiz
title_short: (28721) Cabanillas de la Sierra - 3 Calle Perdiz

title: (28729) Valdemanco - Calle Bella Vista
description: Perfect access for large motorhomes, only fits one or two. There is a lagoon on the other side of the road, but it gets dry in the summer. You have to respect the environment, it is a great place to spend the day, eat and enjoy the tranquility. There are trails for mountain biking and hiking. Valdemanco is very close.

title: (28721) Cabanillas de la Sierra -
description: Level parking lot with fountain and bakery very close by. Perfect for stopping or sleeping. Starting point for cycling or walking routes. Tables to eat very sunny.

title: (40109) Valsaín - 7 Travesía Robledo
description: Next to the cemetery, impressive view of Peñalara and the forest towards Navacerrada. Valsain 5 minutes walk. Hiking trails follow the paved road.

title: (40109) La Granja de San Ildefonso - Calle Cruz de la Gallega
title_short: (40109) La Granja de San Ildefonso - Calle Cruz de la Gallega
description: Super quiet, with views of the mountains, Valsain and Peñalara. 5 minutes from the town walking. Hiking trails leave there.

title: (28729) Cotos de Monterrey - 1D Calle Urgabona
description: Several locations in the middle of holm oaks next to a tower overlooking the valley to Madrid. very calm

title: (28292) El Escorial - 3A Calle Principal
description: Parking next to El Náutico Restaurant. Very nice and quiet area although at night you can receive neighbors a little partying but without major problem and not until too late. In the restaurant you eat great! Recommended.

title: (28749) Pinilla del Valle - 5 Calle Dehesa
description: Quiet parking next to the church of Pinilla Valley. There is a source of drinking water and a picnic area in the parking area. Ideal for quiet bike rides. There are several well-marked trails in the area. Padel and Municipal Football Fields 100 m Follow the signs to Parking Dehesa leaving the church on the right.

title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 2 Paseo Santa Isabel
description: Very cool place to spend the night or park during the day. With nice mountain views. Very close to all the center and places of atmosphere.

title_short: (28270) Colmenarejo - 18 Calle de la Cañada Real
description: Street lit, without services, we spend the night and it was very good, cars spend the night, and the morning runners and bikers, but very well, civil guard.

title: (28048) Madrid - 2A Carretera Colmenar Viejo
description: A large, flat, sandy parking area not far from the palace, dam and reservoir, with shade for cars but little for taller vehicles. The more than 40 picnic tables suggest that it gets crowded in the summer. Good for walking, including steps to the river. It can be windy, with little shelter. Clean and quiet. There is no lighting.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la jarosa

title: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 1 Travesía Puertas Nuevas

title: (28270) Colmenarejo - Unnamed Road
description: Small car park with direct access to the reservoir. Bathing is prohibited in the reservoir and it is required to be in compliance with the responsible declaration of the CHT to be able to navigate with a SUP board or any other boat. There are usual checks.

title: (28270) Colmenarejo - Camino de Villamantilla
description: “La Ermita” parking area, quiet place, picnic tables and drinking water fountains. All types of services in Colmer at 2 km.

title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 9 Paseo Fuente del Príncipe
description: Eco-sanitary area and point with all drinking water emptying and filling services. It has no shadow. This area and eco-sanitary point has been promoted by the Castilian and Leonese motorhome association (ACYLA). Exclusive use for motorhomes and camper.

title: (28729) Valdemanco - 5001 Calle Diseminado
description: Parking in front of the funeral home, very quiet and peaceful place. No services.

name: Camping Capfun El Escorial
title: (28200) Camping Capfun El Escorial
description: Nice campsite. Shaded or sunny locations. Madrid by bus in 40 minutes. El Escorial by bus in 10 minutes. Restaurant.piscines.supermarche.bus 10 minutes walk. 1000 m altitude.

title: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 56 Avenida de Esparta
title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 56 Avenida de Esparta
description:
A nice and a quiet parking place in front of the kids school. Apple of parking spices nearby as well. absolutely quite at night, amazing to sleep.. woke up with birds chiringuito around 6 and 8 by school kids noise. No sign of any type of prohibition.
Pharmacy and other shops at 5 mins walk. Carrefour, and Fuel station at 5 mins drive. Next to it mall of all big brands like Puma, addidas, Leroy Merlín.

title: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 12 Arrabal Casa Vacas
title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 12 Arrabal Casa Vacas
description: Small place almost on the outskirts of the town where, if you park in battery, 2-3 vans can fit, if you continue along the sandy track you can find a hole on the side of the road, a quiet place to spend the night, without No service although there is a fountain in the town, garbage cans and the town's restaurants. From here there are several hiking trails and nearby are the famous pools of San Ildefonso that in summer you can even bathe

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful spots among the pine trees, Reservoir close by for walking around with dogs. Lots of walking tracks in the hill also! There is a little church and cafe but they weren’t open while we were there. We stayed for 3 nights with out a problem. Lots of rubbish bins around the site. There are a few little spots of the road running around the lake with ample amount of space for several motorhome . Only 45 mins from Madrid

title: (28480) Guadarrama - 13 Arrabal Extrarradio
description: Car park of El Alto de los Leones. I think we can decide and stay overnight, to be confirmed. Excellent view.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carr de la Jarosa
description: One of the 3 car parks that the reservoir has. It is the furthest (one kilometer from the first) but it is worth it for its tranquility to sleep. The reservoir is next door, you can have dinner next to the reservoir (with your chairs, table and food) and enjoy a night under the stars. Natural environment and very quiet. There is no service. It depends on whether you are in the car park. In the previous car park, about 500 meters away, there is a restaurant.

title: (28440) Guadarrama - Carretera de La Jarosa
description: Beautiful place to spend the night in nature listening to the cows and with the possibility of having breakfast looking at the reservoir. recommendable

title: (28751) La Cabrera - 2 Diseminado el Eros
description: Park right next to a quiet street. There are no services, but the nearest town is 2 km away with a bar, supermarket.

title: (28440) Guadarrama -
description: Very large parking lot under the pine trees located near a bar, early morning hiker, 20 minutes from Valle los Caidos and 1:00 from Madrid. Access with nasturtium cc and 7 meters long. There is very clean service.

title: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 119 CL-601
title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - 119 CL-601

title_short: (28232) Las Rozas - 1 Camino Viejo de las Matas

title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 24 Carretera de El Escorial

title_short: (40100) Real Sitio de San Ildefonso - Ruta de los Reales Sitios

title_short: (28232) Las Rozas de Madrid - 29 Travesía de Navalcarbón

title: (28232) Las Rozas - Unnamed Road
description: Huge local parking area free of charge. If not busy you can park little behind to disconnect from road noice. Near by: supermarket,restaurants and bars, athletic stadium and swimming pool, indoor skydiving simulator and very nice park for walks or bycicle rides. Water pumps with drinkable water placed on the side of the park. Also 300 m far is Repsol gas station. If you need WIFI there is street full of little restaurants with accesible connection.

name: Camping Pico de la Miel
title: (28751) Camping Pico de la Miel
description: Camping Pico de la Miel. Good installations. Near the village. Excessively expensive to my liking. 30 euros motorhome-light-2 people. A motorhome costs the same as a camper than a car or a tent. . Bad pricing policy.

title: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 382 Calle Monte Escorial
title_short: (28200) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - 382 Calle Monte Escorial
description: Ground parking next to the forest track. Gratuitous. Very close to forest firefighters. Excellent views. Ideal place to start mountain routes in Abantos, both walking and cycling. In general sunny, although it has some shadows. It has no height limitation. To sleep it is super quiet since the asphalted forest track has hardly any traffic and less at night. Fountain and garbage containers one kilometer below.

title_short: (28209) San Lorenzo de El Escorial - s/n Carretera de Guadarrama

title_short: (28702) San Sebastián de los Reyes - 34 Avenida Severo Ochoa
